text: Zisas mba bunin mba Fhe Bakɨme phena gari gumgir pani mben gumgi ruu ga suaŋgiap, mbaram buna mueŋ vhunama dav khaŋ mba gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuai, “Guma mbe wain mɨna mben pargi. Ana mba wain mɨnan pargiap, ana ndim gumgi mbari farve khɨngi. Ana mba wain mɨnan mbe farve khɨngiap khaŋ mbe nzuai, ‘Nde na wain mɨna ganɨv, ana shɨgar muuŋri. Nde ana shɨgar muunga, nen vhez nde wari ndiv nder thueŋ ndirga, gu wo thueŋ ndirga.’ Ana maaŋ mbe suaŋgiap, mba wain mɨnan mbe farve khɨngip, ana nduara ŋgɨp, saman ki ŋanen harigi ŋgun ŋgɨgɨp, tuga mpeeŋra mba ŋanen kɨrga.
